Name: Warboys
Description: Named after its leader, whose real identity is unknown to both the Periphery and Inner Sphere, the Warboys' motto is 'chaos through firepower'. Their tactics usually rely on unleashing their 'Mechs weapons in multiple barrages to demolish any defenses and scare off any guards or bystanders before raiding their targets for any valuable items.
ReputationStatements: You have come to me Commander. Do you have the required firepower?

MissionSuccessStatements: Chaos through superior firepower. You have done well Commander.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Only those who face the element of firepower know its true meaning. You have glanced at its mystery.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Are you questioning my better judgment in hiring you? Because your actions here have left me wondering.
